Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 67th/Jeffery
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore Drive and Lakeshore Drive, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffery.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Purple Line Delays
